thread.title: Alvyda Stepaviciute

author: Alvyda Stepaviciute
title: Alvyda Stepaviciute
text: With rentalcars, all the above-mentioned procedures were very easy and efficient. The only drawback is that the final price including extras (e.g. Full Protection coverage) is not indicated at any stage before one completes a reservation. Therefore, in the process of reservation, it's not totally clear whether the Full Protection is already included with the booking, or is it an option for an extra price.
